InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 3

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weaponâ€™s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: Scorpion GT-215 Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 2

The Scorpion GT-215 is a hydraulically-driven Gatling-type rotary cannon designed to deliver smaller rounds at a very high rate of fire. The Scorpion is designed to shred armor on very fast targets, sacrificing power for absolute saturation of the target area.

InstalledItem.Name: Anvil Hornet F7C Nose Turret
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Turret
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Size: 3

This nose turret was designed specifically for Anvil's F7C Hornet to allow for mounting two Size-1 weapons and precise gimbaled tracking of targets.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-117 Bulldog Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 1

Featuring a three-barrel sequential fire design, the Klaus & Werner CF-117 Bulldog laser repeater is capable of delivering high velocity energy rounds while maintaining heat efficiency making it a favorite among new pilots who are outfitting their first ship.

InstalledItem.Name: C4-160f S5 Hornet Ball Turret
InstalledItem.Description: Give your Hornet's firepower a boost with the C4-160f. Designed by Anvil specifically for its F7 series, this S5 ball turret can equip two S2 ship weapons.

InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner

Size: 2

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Wernerâ€™s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 4xS1

Behringâ€™s MSD-341 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S1 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Marksman I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 1

Behring's Marksman series of proximity missiles has earned as much of a reputation for its ability to track a wide range of heat signatures as it has for its area-effect proximity damage.

InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Gorgon Defender Industries first created the AllStop shield generator to hold off the Vanduul. They worked so well that many military crafts were known to prefer the AllStop. Just one of the many reasons to have one on your ship.
